## Summary

Brazilian expert in computational social science and Digital Humanities. Coordinator of the Digital Humanities Laboratory at UFBA since 2018. Research focuses on far-right groups on Telegram, hate speech, and misinformation in Brazil.

## Current Positions

- **Adjunct Professor** — Federal University of Bahia (UFBA), 2016–Present
- **Research Director** — Digital Humanities Lab at UFBA, 2018–Present
- **Member** — Administrative Council for Economic Defense, Ministry of Justice, 2024–Present
